headline: 5 Very Safe High-Yield Dividend Stocks Boomers Can Hold Forever
summary: While many Baby Boomers have enjoyed a long bull market over the past 35 years, there is a point when income becomes more critical than stock appreciation. The reason is simple: those who leave their careers to enjoy a well-deserved retirement lose the benefits of a regular salary and their jobs, such as 401(k) matching ... 5 Very Safe High-Yield Dividend Stocks Boomers Can Hold Forever

headline: Ford’s Truck Strategy Shift Amid Model e Writedown Raises New Questions For (F)
summary: Earlier in February 2026, Ford confirmed plans for another combustion-powered ute to enter production later this decade, adding to a growing mix of ICE, hybrid and future Universal EV platform-based pickups that includes a mid-size electric ute targeted around US$30,000. This fresh model, alongside Ford’s push into Level 3 “eyes-off” driving from 2028, highlights how the company is reshaping its truck lineup while trying to balance advanced technology with affordability and powertrain...

headline: A Look At Ford Motor (F) Valuation After Q4 2025 Miss Model E Writedown And 2026 Outlook Shift
summary: Ford Motor (F) is back in focus after a weak Q4 2025, a sizeable Model e writedown, and fresh 2026 guidance that leans into hybrids, cost-focused EVs, and a new battery storage business. See our latest analysis for Ford Motor. The recent 4.1% 1 day share price return and 7.7% 90 day share price return suggest buyers are responding to Ford Motor’s new hybrid first, lower cost EV and energy storage plans. The 58.5% 1 year total shareholder return reflects how sentiment has shifted over a longer...
